screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping cart page on the Best Buy website. It shows an item (ASUS Zenbook Flip 2-in-1 15.6" OLED Touch-Screen Laptop) with its specifications and price. There is an option to save the item for later or remove it from the cart. Additionally, there is a promotional offer for protection savings, and a free Webroot antivirus subscription is included with the purchase.
action_think: The user wants to clear all items from the cart on Best Buy. The cart is already empty. There is no need to perform any further actions.
action_result: The action of clicking on the Remove link has removed the selected item from the cart, bringing us closer to the goal of clearing all items from the cart.
